actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide needed facilities and services not otherwise available for the accommodation of visitors in the areas administered by the National Park Service, by authorizing the Secretary of the Interior to guarantee loans which are part of concessioner investments in such facilities and services, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to guarantee loans for improvements by National Park Service concessioners who will bear at least 10 percent of the cost of improvements. Limits the aggregate amount of outstanding guaranteed loans to $25,000,000. Requires that loans not be guaranteed under this Act unless: (1) without it the concessioner could not obtain funds; (2) the improvement is economically sound; and (3) the improvement is appropriate for public use and enjoyment of the area. Creates the National Park Service Guarantee Fund for the purpose of carrying out the Act. Sets forth provisions regarding defaults on the loans. Bars termination or revocation of the guarantee except in certain circumstances.

titles.title: A bill to provide needed facilities and services not otherwise available for the accommodation of visitors in the areas administered by the National Park Service, by authorizing the Secretary of the Interior to guarantee loans which are part of concessioner investments in such facilities and services, and for other purposes.
